From: ' 
To: Marc Femich , Martin Weinberg "Weingarten, 
Reid" , "Miller, Michael" 
Cc: 
II 
l/ 
[Contractor)" 
Subject: 19 Cr. 490 (RMB) - 
Discovery Production 
Date: Wed, 31 Jul 2019 22:11:22 +0000 
Attachments: 2019.07.3I_Epstein_Discovety_Letter.pdf 
Counsel, 
The Government's first discovery production in this case has been loaded onto the drive you provided this afternoon and 
is ready for pickup at our office. If you are sending a runner to pick up the production, he or she should just ask for the 
envelope with Michael Miller's name on it. I've also attached a copy of the accompanying discovery and disclosure letter 
to this email. 
Please let me know if you have any difficulty accessing the discovery on the drive. 
Best, 
Assistant United States Attorney 
Southern District of New York 
EFTA00014581
